name: DIE HURD ?
description:
It's Christmas night and Mc Badass is in a terrible situation to free Becky from a building plenty of enemies.

Some friend will help Mc Badass in his fight.

NOTE: Jam game, it's a proof of concept. If people likes the game enough It could be improved. But I'm concious that it's a "wierd concept" ;) Have fun.
